args.natural_language_statement: Let Γ be a group acting freely by isometries on a metric space X, and assume the orbits are discrete. Show that the quotient map π : X → X/Γ is a covering map which is locally an isometry (i.e. a locally isometric covering). Formulate this as a lemma in Lean4: given (X : Type*) [MetricSpace X] (Γ : Type*) [Group Γ] [MulAction Γ X] and the action is free and each γ acts by an isometry and orbits are discrete, then the natural quotient_map X → Quotient (·) is a covering_map and locally_isometric_map. End the statement with := by sorry and import Mathlib at the top.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/--
Statement (informal): Let Γ be a group acting freely by isometries on a metric space X,
and assume the orbits are discrete. Then the quotient map X → X/Γ is a covering map
which is locally an isometry (a locally isometric covering).

This file records the statement as a lemma; the proof is omitted (``sorry'').
-/
theorem quotient_map_is_locally_isometric_covering
  {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X]
  {Γ : Type*} [Group Γ] [MulAction Γ X]
  (free_action : Prop) (acts_by_isometries : Prop) (orbits_discrete : Prop) : Prop := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

theorem _test_compile : True := by trivial

/--
Let Γ act freely by isometries on a metric space X with discrete orbits.
Then the quotient map X → X/Γ is a covering map and locally isometric.
(This lemma records the statement; the proof is omitted.)
-/
theorem quotient_map_is_locally_isometric_covering
  {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X]
  {Γ : Type*} [Group Γ] [MulAction Γ X]
  (free_action : Prop) (acts_by_isometries : Prop) (orbits_discrete : Prop) : Prop := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/--
Let Γ act freely by isometries on a metric space X with discrete orbits.
Then the quotient map X → X/Γ is a covering map and locally isometric.
(This lemma records the statement; the proof is omitted.)
-/
theorem quotient_map_is_locally_isometric_covering
  {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X]
  {Γ : Type*} [Group Γ] [MulAction Γ X]
  (free_action : Prop) (acts_by_isometries : Prop) (orbits_discrete : Prop) : Prop := by
